This product is worth more than $100 to me, and I believe it could be incredibly beneficial for you. For a limited time, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $150. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience its remarkable features and benefits. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer
